title: Interactive Sales Forecasting Dashboard
description: Designed to monitor YoY trends, customer loyalty tiers, and inventory risks in real-time. Used SQL for querying, integrated with Azure DB, and automated daily scheduling.

title: Customer Behavior Analytics with Python
description: Applied clustering and regression to e-commerce datasets to segment users and define retention strategies, contributing to 90% loyalty program success rate.

title: PAYE Tax Calculator
description: Developed an interactive web-based PAYE calculator using React and JavaScript by translating an Excel payroll tax model. The tool enables Nigerian employees to understand their monthly tax deductions, including pension, NHF, and NHIS, enhancing transparency and financial awareness.
